1 Test
* Map size: $xwiki.xWiki.store.store.getConnections().size() #set($store = $xwiki.xWiki.store.store) #set($ok = $store.beginTransaction(true,$context.context)) #set($session = $store.getSession($context.context)) * $session.connection() $session.connection() $store.endTransaction($context.context, false) * Map size: $xwiki.xWiki.store.store.getConnections().size()
